```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tint)
library(dplyr)
# invalidate cache when the package version changes
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE, cache.extra = packageVersion('tint'))
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
```

```{r}

lithics <- read.csv("Data/CE_Lithics_all.csv")
lithics$Participant <- as.numeric(as.factor(lithics$Participant))

```

```{r SOM table 1}

particip_rm <- lithics %>% 
  group_by(Participant, Raw_Material) %>%
  summarise(N = n())

write.csv(particip_rm, "Tables/SOM_T1_RM_Particip.csv")

```

```{r}

particip_break_down <- lithics %>% 
  group_by(Participant, Context) %>%
  summarise(N = n())

write.csv(particip_break_down, "Tables/SOM_T2_Selection_Particip.csv")

```


```{r}
stage_break_down <- lithics %>% group_by(Context) %>%
  summarise(med = median(Mass, na.rm = TRUE))
```
